I wonder why her radio doesn't seem to have any static it's like they say a=
 
 word or two, then it's silent and then another word, i wonder if she is =

using it  in FM or AM, on the RS 12-125, yes, I have one of those, it's my=
 
best of the  radio's, i like it because i can change the bass treble, and=
 it 
doesn't have as  much static, but it's no where as clear as hers.  sf
=
 
 
In a message dated 3/9/2011 7:11:07 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
urkel=
23@... writes:

 
 
 

It says in the comments below, that they were us=
ing a 12-150 shack  hack. I 
believe you already have one of those radios.
=

-Steve
